lexUnit.name: interested.a

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: FN: having a desire for someone or something

sentence.text: “ Sometimes it seems as if you 're only interested in the children . ”
